SELECT seq_bookcode.CURRVAL AS bookcode FROM DUAL
insert into reservation( bookcode, startdate, enddate, howmany, mobile, roomcode ) values( seq_bookcode.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{howmany}, #{mobile}, #{roomcode} )
mapper.select: select distinct * from room where type=#{roomType} and roomcode not in( select A.roomcode from room A, reservation B where A.type = #{roomType} and A.roomcode = B.roomcode and (B.startdate <= #{endDate} and B.enddate >= #{startDate}))
select B.bookcode, A.*, B.startdate, B.enddate,B.mobile from room A, reservation B where A.roomcode = B.roomcode and A.type=#{roomType} and (B.startdate <= #{endDate} and B.enddate >= #{startDate})
